name: Speed Hoarder
description:
You are a hoarder and a “Preems” subscriber at “Amazin,” your favorite online retailer. You have a near constant stream of new boxes arriving and you will run out of space quickly if you don’t organize your hoard efficiently. When an Amazin delivery truck arrives, quickly pickup the boxes and stack them on the floor over one of the green glowing indicators or another box. Boxes of the same type can be combined up to three times to take up less vertical space and award more points, while different products will only stack on top of each other.

GameOVER if the delivery van hits a previously delivered box!

Controls: 
Move - left (A) / right (D)
Jump – Space
Aim – Mouse cursor
Pickup / Drop – Left click
